name: nuclide-ios-simulator-logs
description: A nuclide-output provider for iOS Simulator logs

senderBlacklist.title: Sender Blacklist
senderBlacklist.description: Exclude messages sent by these senders from the output window

pathToSyslog.title: Path to syslog executable
pathToSyslog.description: Absolute path to the syslog executable on your system.

whitelistedTags.title: Tags to include
whitelistedTags.description: Messages that don't have tags that match this pattern will be ignored.
